scenario.init: Machine is in normal operation; hydraulic oil level is stable and the hydraulic pump motor is running normally.
scenario.expected_result: Hydraulic oil level remains within acceptable limits, and the pump motor operates continuously without interruption.
scenario.instead_failure: Due to Leakage the oil level begins to fall continuously, eventually leading to motor failure.

diagnoses.name: Leakage in hydraulics system
diagnoses.comment: Leakage causes oil levels to drop, resulting in a pump failure.

diagnoses.name: Hydraulic pump motor fails
diagnoses.comment: Leakage causes oil levels to drop, resulting in a pump failure.
